sqlMap.select:
/* ztadm601.selectAdminList */ SELECT T1.ADMIN_ID ,T1.ADMIN_NM ,T1.LOGIN_ID ,T1.PWD ,T1.ADMIN_TP_CD ,T1.EMP_NO ,T1.EMAIL ,T1.TEL_NO ,T1.CELL_NO ,T1.ACTIVE_YN ,T1.PWD_ERROR_CNT ,T1.PWD_ERROR_DY ,T1.REG_ID ,TO_CHAR(T1.REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DATE ,TO_CHAR(T1.MOD_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MOD_DATE ,T1.MOD_DATE ,T3.CD_NM AS ADMIN_TP_NM ,CASE WHEN SUBSTR(T3.REF1,2,1) = '1' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END CUST_AUTH ,CASE WHEN SUBSTR(T3.REF1,3,1) = '1' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END LOCA_AUTH ,T1.TEL_NO ,T1.CELL_NO ,T1.CORP_NO FROM SAD_USER T1 ,SET_CODE T3 ,SME_CORP T4 WHERE T1.ADMIN_TP_CD = T3.MINOR_CD AND T1.CORP_NO = T4.CORP_NO
AND T4.BIZ_NO = #biz_no#
AND T3.MAJOR_CD = 'ADM01'
AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM SAD_ROLE_ASSIGN S1 WHERE S1.ADMIN_ID = T1.ADMIN_ID AND S1.ROLE_ID = #role_id# )
AND T1.ADMIN_ID = #admin_id#
AND T1.ADMIN_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#admin_nm#,'%'))
AND T1.ADMIN_TP_CD = #admin_tp_cd#
ORDER BY T3.ORDER_SEQ, T1.ADMIN_NM
sqlMap.insert: /* ztadm601.insertAdmin */ INSERT INTO SAD_USER ( ADMIN_ID ,ADMIN_NM ,LOGIN_ID ,PWD ,ADMIN_TP_CD ,EMP_NO ,EMAIL ,TEL_NO ,CELL_NO ,ACTIVE_YN ,PWD_ERROR_CNT ,PWD_ERROR_DY ,REG_ID ,REG_DATE ,MOD_ID ,MOD_DATE ) VALUES ( #admin_id# ,#admin_nm# ,#login_id# ,#pwd# ,#admin_tp_cd# ,#emp_no# ,#email# ,#tel_no# ,#cell_no# ,#active_yn# ,0 ,NULL ,#user_id# ,SYSDATE ,#user_id# ,SYSDATE )
/* ztadm601.insertAdminRoleAssign */ INSERT INTO SAD_ROLE_ASSIGN ( ADMIN_ID ,ROLE_ID ,REG_ID ,REG_DATE ,MOD_ID ,MOD_DATE ) VALUES ( #admin_id# ,#role_id# ,#user_id# ,SYSDATE ,#user_id# ,SYSDATE )
sqlMap.update: /* ztadm601.updateAdmin */ UPDATE SAD_USER SET ADMIN_NM = #admin_nm# ,LOGIN_ID = #login_id# ,ADMIN_TP_CD = #admin_tp_cd# ,EMP_NO = #emp_no# ,EMAIL = #email# ,TEL_NO = #tel_no# ,CELL_NO = #cell_no# ,ACTIVE_YN = #active_yn# ,PWD_ERROR_CNT = #pwd_error_cnt# ,MOD_ID = #user_id# ,MOD_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE ADMIN_ID = #admin_id#
sqlMap.delete: /* ztadm601.deleteAdmin */ DELETE FROM SAD_USER WHERE ADMIN_ID = #admin_id#
